width

public MediaParameters.Builder width(int width)
The width of the image. Be sure to set allowStretch(boolean) if the width will be larger than its original size.

Parameters:
width - image width.
Returns:
this builder.

public MediaParameters.Builder allowStretch(boolean allowStretch)
Allow stretching the image beyond its original size.

Parameters:
allowStretch - whether to allow stretch.
Returns:
this builder.

scale

public MediaParameters.Builder scale(float scale)
Scale factor for the image to display. Be sure to set allowStretch(boolean) if the image will be scaled to larger than its original size. Any positive floating point number using a dot such as 1.5, which corresponds to 150%.

Parameters:
scale - scale.
Returns:
this builder.

thumbnail

public MediaParameters.Builder thumbnail(boolean thumbnail)
Display a thumbnail of the requested file, useful for images as well as other media types, such as PDF, flash, and so on.

Parameters:
thumbnail - whether to show thumbnail.
Returns:
this builder.

disableMediaCaching

public MediaParameters.Builder disableMediaCaching(boolean disable)
Disable the media cache for this request. If true, the image will always be retrieved from the database, bypassing the media cache.

Parameters:
disable - whether to use media cache for request.
Returns:
this builder.

build

public MediaParameters build()
Builds MediaParameters.

Returns:
MediaParameters parameters.
